meanings.definition: The surgical removal of the larynx.
meanings.sent1: After the laryngectomy, the patient communicated using a special device.

meanings.sent3: The laryngectomy patient joked about becoming a silent movie star.
meanings.sent4: The laryngectomy was like removing the voice box of a singing bird.
meanings.sent5: The laryngectomy left a noticeable scar on the neck.

meanings.definition: A person who has undergone a laryngectomy.

meanings.sent2: The support group welcomed the new laryngectomy warmly.
meanings.sent3: The laryngectomy surprised everyone with their excellent lip-reading skills.
